typeSystemDescription.name: Minimal TypeSystem for IBM Content Analytics Studio

typeDescription.name: uima.tcas.DocumentAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Annotation covering the entire document, containing document meta information, for example the document language

featureDescription.name: languageCandidates
featureDescription.description: A list of language candidates for the document produced during language identification. These are sorted by confidence value

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.TTAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base type for lexical and document structure annotation types

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.DocStructureAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base type for document structure annotation types

featureDescription.name: paragraphNumber
featureDescription.description: The sequence number of the paragraph in the document

featureDescription.name: sentenceNumber
featureDescription.description: The sequence number of the sentence in the paragraph (or the document)

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.LexicalAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base type for lexical annotation types

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.DictionaryEntryAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base type for dictionary-based user-defined annotation types

featureDescription.name: lemma
featureDescription.description: Morphological information for the dictionary entry

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.TokenLikeAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Base type for token annotation types

featureDescription.name: lemma
featureDescription.description: The best probable entry containing all morphological information for the token

featureDescription.name: lemmaEntries
featureDescription.description: List of lemma entries containing all morphological information for the token

featureDescription.name: dictionaryMatch
featureDescription.description: A flag indicating whether or not the token matches a dictionary entry

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.TokenAnnotation
typeDescription.description: General token annotation type. It is also the base type for the special token types

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.CompPartAnnotation
typeDescription.description: A part of a compound word

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.KeyStringEntry
typeDescription.description: Base type for types defining key/value feature (e.g. uima.tt.Lemma type)

featureDescription.name: key
featureDescription.description: A key/value feature (e.g. lemma string in uima.tt.Lemma type)

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.Lemma
typeDescription.description: Morphological information retrieved from a lexical dictionary entry

featureDescription.name: partOfSpeech
featureDescription.description: An integral encoding representing the part-of-speech for the lemma

featureDescription.name: frost_ExtendedPOS
featureDescription.description: An integer representing additional information related to the part-of-speech

typeDescription.name: uima.tt.LanguageConfidencePair
typeDescription.description: Language-Confidence pair of a language candidate for the document text

featureDescription.name: languageConfidence
featureDescription.description: An indication (a float value between 0 and 1) of how well the candidate language actually fits the language of the document

typeDescription.name: com.ibm.langware.uimatypes.WordLikeToken
typeDescription.description: Base type for possible words (not punctuations nor symbols). Also represents alphanumeric tokens
